title: @Riot KateyKhaos
body: Is there any hope that there will be more Star Wars themed skins :D ?

replies.body: Haha, you never know! Got any good ideas? :3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AUrGZaRx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-08T23:01:14.550+0000)
>
> Haha, you never know! Got any good ideas? :3

Jar Jar Jinx
Mate, please tell me there is a picture of this on the internet.
Congratulations, you just broke LoL, SW *and* the internet
{{champion:6}}  Urgot the Hutt

What about Jedi skins for Fiora, Riven and when they use their aoe abilities its like force pushes and stuff. and Wukong(because he is master Yi's apprentice, and be his padawan :D). then Sith more rage and angry champions like Tryndamere and Diana and Aatrox.
I love the idea for Riven, but for Fiora, do you think it'd be too close to PROJECT?
Not if you change her outfit and the color of her sword.

you already have a project skin and a jedi skin for yi. besides, so long as you base fiora off of a jedi and not sith the colors won't match due to project fiora being a gray and pink combination and the jedi skin being a brown and either a green or blue, possibly both.
Not at all. PROJECT is sharp, and organic. SW feels sleek and fluid with some grit thrown in there

Not really. Her sword could be a blue lightsaber because in her lore she has a blue steel blade. Her Q could be something acrobatic like a flip because the Jedi always do flashy stuff. Her W she absorbs the spell with her force, like how Yoda abosrbs dark force powers. Her E, maybe it changes colors likes Yi's. Then her R, once she detonates it it places the Jedi emblem on the floor :D. http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/41bFfDUA3uL.jpg

And then she could be wearing robes :D.
Forsaken Fiora plz :D
Off topic, but when are the harrowing skins coming back? :p
Around Harrowing (aka this Halloween) of course.

I got some:
Chosen Diana (she already plays like a Jedi) & Space Bounty hunter (working title) Miss Fortune that's similar to [Boba Fett](http://img.lum.dolimg.com/v1/images/Boba-Fett_61fdadfd.jpeg?region=0%2C0%2C1200%2C675&width=768).
I feel like Lucian is a better fit for that skin.

Han Solo Lucian

Baba Fett Jinx

Ewoks Teemo, Rumble, Annie, Poppy and Gnar

Jaba the Hut Zac

Chewbacca Rengar or Warwick

Forsaken Soraka, Fiora, Kassadin, Wukong and Tryndamere

Chosen Riven, Garen, Yasou, Taric and Xin Zhao

Jawa Viegar, Lulu, Tristana, Amumu and Ziggs

Leia Miss Fortune

Dark Emperor Azir
I would rather recommend Xin Zhao as one of the android guards of General Grievous
Don't forget Rebel pilot Corki riding a "Totally not an X-wing" spacefighter.
And for he e she like, force pulls all around her :D

http://s2.buzzhand.net/uploads/d4/2/761709/14369582471735.jpg
Idk about you, but this doesn't look anywhere NEAR project Fiora.

Also, this skin has been in circulation for a long time on the internet wanting to happen, but I think it would have been so much better on her old kit since her new kit doesn't exactly scream "Jedi" anymore.

As for other ideas I could think of Aatrox as a Darth Vader like character, Ekko as a sort of Luke or something, Veigar as a Yoda like person (completely switch his personality), MF and Lucian as Bounty Hunters (if you do make MF as a bounty hunter can we PLEASE not do any of this fan service stuff? Meaning mid drift, cleavage, etc. Bounty hunter armor doesn't show that stuff.....Not that I'm sure a lot of fans of MF would complain, I would just find it silly), Urgot or some other big champion as a Jaba like person, Wukong as a sort of Darth Maul, Maybe even make a sith and jedi skin for all champs that are able so people can use which one they like best on a champion.

Seeing a Jedi Yi and a Darth Yi fight each other would be amazing. Imagine if their lightsabers/swords actually hit each other and "blocked" while they fought. Idk, that'd be unique.

Alas, even if these skins were made I have no money for the RP and only time to gain the IP....so RIP any of these skins for me! XD

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AUrGZaRx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-08T23:01:14.550+0000)
>
> Haha, you never know! Got any good ideas? :3

idk which one, but we need a yordle Yoda

> [{quoted}](name=zzman73051,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AUrGZaRx,comment-id=0000000a,timestamp=2015-10-10T20:58:45.367+0000)
>
> idk which one, but we need a yordle Yoda

All of them.

"The origin of the word "Yordle" came from a dream that Paul “Pabro” Bellezza had. He had a dream about Yoda and Yaddle from Star Wars, and woke up saying “Yordles."
-http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Yordle

If Amumu is still supposed to be a yordle, i'd say he fits the most. Or Gnar?
Nunu would half work (though I'm pretty sure he's *not* a yordle anymore) nunu=yoda, willump=luke-

https://journeythereandbackagain.files.wordpress.com/2014/10/the-empire-strikes-back-luke-skywalker-and-yoda.jpg

omggg Blitzcrank could be R2D2 and Orianna can be C3PO and Lissandra could be Queen Amadala since she has that weird head shape XD

I would loveeee to be a jedi in game, I would actually try a melee champion for once XD

> [{quoted}](name=Lady Septimus Eh,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AUrGZaRx,comment-id=00000005,timestamp=2015-10-09T00:36:23.596+0000)

> 
> I would loveeee to be a jedi in game, I would actually try a melee champion for once XD

.....chosen yi? O.o
but he doesn't have that cool jedi cloak that Yoda and Obi-wan have XD i love the cloak!

> [{quoted}](name=Lady Septimus Eh,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AUrGZaRx,comment-id=0000000500030000,timestamp=2015-10-10T02:17:10.400+0000)
>
> but he doesn't have that cool jedi cloak that Yoda and Obi-wan have XD i love the cloak!

touche................Riot you listening O.o
So they would be R2-Blitz2 and C3-POri right?
Haha, yessss please! I love the idea of Blitzcrank and Orianna. :3
Chosen Yi is clearly a Jedi (and is about to get all-new splash art, too!)
Twilek Evelynn

[Yuuzhan Vong](http://starwars.wikia.com/wiki/Yuuzhan_Vong), or Far Outsider Aatrox
Change his sword into a snake staff and you're already halfway there.

Self inflicting pain/damage, check.
Living weaponry, check.
Likes to make other people kill each other, check.
From unknown other world, check.

Come to think of it, was Aatrox already based off the Yuuzhan Vong?

Though with Star Wars' retcon...not even sure if Yuuzhan Vong are 'Star Wars' anymore. {{item:3070}}

If TK had a weapon, he'd be a good yoda imo... Wukong as Maul could be cool. Azir may already have a science-fictiony skin but I believe you could work some Star wars into him (laser blaster scepter?)
what about {{champion:78}} and she has a green hammer, kinda like how jayces is, but green and smaller.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AUrGZaRx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-08T23:01:14.550+0000)
>
> Haha, you never know! Got any good ideas? :3

Can we get low level balanced, bots using player accounts, champion balance, and the new player experience unfucked before more useless cosmetics?

Rogue Jedi Kassadin sounds like a good idea. It even fits his role of being a good guy in a bad place. 

Padawan Ekko

Lucian Solo

Gragas/Urgot the Hutt

Kat as Mara Jade

Veigar as Yoda

Mandalorian Jinx

Sion would make a badass host for a Darth Bane skin, though Darth Bane was massive in both size and intelligence and Sion is lacking in the latter.

You could make a champion that uses a whip and make an Emperor's Hand/Lumiya style skin.
Darth Jax, cuzz of the way he pins his staff :P could have a red lightsaber and complimenting robes {{champion:24}}
I really want to see an "ewok" skin for gnar or some other champ xD
